title: Microsoft confirms minimum specs for running Android apps on Windows 11
content:
Earlier this week, Microsoft launched the ability to run Android apps on Windows 11 computers. Now the company has revealed the official minimum specs for your Windows 11 PC to run Android apps and the Amazon Appstore.

more…

The post Microsoft confirms minimum specs for running Android apps on Windows 11 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Microsoft has revealed the official minimum specs for your Windows 11 PC to run Android apps and the Amazon Appstore.
